description:
At our company, we put new graduates and those looking to start their business careers first by allowing our managers time to teach and entry-level team members time to learn. Our full-time positions offer the ability to be challenged and to prepare for a career that positively impacts the community. Our mission is to provide a stellar consumer experience, propelling our clients to the next level, and exceeding sales expectations.

This full-time Marketing Team Member offers hands-on experience in the marketing, sales, and communications industry, which can lead to career opportunities in management. Our collaborative work gives you the opportunity to learn basic marketing skills, gain leadership abilities, develop sales techniques and communication skills, and increase knowledge in a variety of key business concepts.

Marketing Team Member Responsibilities:

  • Conduct direct marketing presentation directives to consumers by executing business merchandising and promotional marketing plans
  • Attend mandatory training sessions to acquire brand knowledge of new products, services, and branding strategies in order to stay up to date with new deals and sales promotions
  • Assist consumers with any questions they may have regarding featured client products or promotional services during each client acquisition promotion
  • Collaborate with the sales team and account management staff to ensure optimal consumer satisfaction, achieve sales targets, and increase profit margins
  • Build confiding relations with potential consumers by representing our brands in an approachable and enthusiastic light

Requirements for our Marketing Team Members:

  • Enrolled in or recently graduated from an accredited four-year college or university is a bonus but not required
  • Willing to work all full-time hours which may include evenings and some weekends
  • Experience in Customer Service, Retail, Marketing, Sales, Communications, or related fields
  • Communicate in an appropriate, clear, and concise manner with consumers, clients, fellow employees, and management staff
  • Strong communication skills with the ability to influence and drive results

What we offer within our organization:

  • Hands-on training
  • Travel opportunities
  • Company events and social gatherings
  • Community involvement
